definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)

sentences.english: There are many places of interesting in Jing tai.
The streets about the castle are full of places of historic interest.
sentences.chinese: 城堡周围的街道上净是名胜古迹。

sentences.english: Large Siminghu a long history, stunning scenery and landmarks Zhouza the meantime.
sentences.chinese: 大明湖历史悠久，景色秀美，名胜古迹周匝其间。

sentences.english: How many places of historical interest have you visited ?
sentences.chinese: 你曾参观过多少的名胜古迹？

sentences.english: Nam breasted mountain with the sea, beautiful scenery, monuments are spread all over.
sentences.chinese: 南安襟山带海，风光秀丽，名胜古迹星罗棋布。

sentences.english: I'm afraid two-days time isn't enough to see all the historical places of interest.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕两天的时间不够游览所有的名胜古迹。

sentences.english: He's also seen sights that have made the journey worthwhile.
sentences.chinese: 而且他也看到不少名胜古迹，这让旅行更有价值。

sentences.english: They were happy to be in Indonesia. They had many people to meet, and many places to visit.
sentences.chinese: 再此期间他们将会见多为领导及参观许多名胜古迹。

sentences.english: Guangzhou is well-known tourist city, renowned for their large number of known sites.
sentences.chinese: 广州还是著名的旅游城市，素以名胜古迹众多而闻名。

sentences.english: He’s also seen sights that have made the journey worthwhile. “Opportunity is out there.
sentences.chinese: 而且他也看到不少名胜古迹，这让旅行更有价值。

sentences.english: China's key point of interst showplaces attract thousands of foreign visitors every year.
sentences.chinese: 中国的名胜古迹每年都吸引着成千上万的外国游客。

sentences.english: Nanjing has many attractions, such as Sun Yat-sen, Jiming Temple, Stone Town.
sentences.chinese: 南京有许多名胜古迹，比如中山陵，鸡鸣寺，石头城。

sentences.english: The large cities are of course do not have a monopolise on architectural or historical monuments.
sentences.chinese: 当然大城市并不占尽建筑风采或名胜古迹之风雅。

sentences.english: I can see many places of great intrests.
sentences.chinese: 我可以观访很多名胜古迹。

sentences.english: There are so many places of historical interest here. Welcome to Huaian again.
sentences.chinese: 淮安有很多名胜古迹，欢迎您再到淮安来。

sentences.english: Liangshan has a unique natural landscape and cultural landscape, many places of interest.
sentences.chinese: 梁山有独特的自然景观和人文景观，名胜古迹众多。

definition: a place famous for its scenery or historical relics/scenic spot/CL:處|处[chu4]
places of historic interest/historical sites/CL:個|个[ge4]
